content.question:
A particle moves along the graph of y = cos x so that the x-component of acceleration is always 2. At time t = 0, the particle is at the point (π, −1) and the velocity vector of the particle is (0,0).

(a) Find the x- and y-coordinates of the position of the particle in terms of t.
